With this function you can show, or suppress, the various different "toast" pop-up notifications relating to challenges. When the arguments are set to <tt>true</tt> these messages will appear, informing the player of any local or remote challenges received as well as those challenges that have been completed, while setting them to <tt>false</tt> will suppress these notifications.
Show challenges received pop-up (<tt>true</tt>) or not (<tt>false<tt>).</tt></tt>
Show completed local challenges pop-up (<tt>true</tt>) or not (<tt>false<tt>).</tt></tt>
Show completed remote challenges pop-up (<tt>true</tt>) or not (<tt>false<tt>).</tt></tt>
The above code will set challenge toast notifications to be shown for received challenges only.
